website_summaries.verdict: This fountain is made from a polystone material that looks like stone, but is light enough to hang easily on the wall.
pros: Fountain has 3 streams of water for added interest
The flow on this fountain can be adjusted
Water is contained within the fountain
Provides a peaceful water noise from a really pretty fountain
cons: This fountain does not come with an included light for night viewing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the fountain, came with a crack in the back and the triangle in the back to hang it on the wall is very shallow. Also the inside bowl of the fountain is flaking paint and material.
customer_reviews.author: Just D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It makes a lovely sound - enough to drown out the nearby car / people noise. Makes my tiny courtyard feel like a protected space as it is all I hear. It's pretty, too!
customer_reviews.author: tbel123

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love patio fountains! This one is good. It does seem like it is overpriced for resin and a small pump and a tube. $149 seems high. But, it is easy to put together and lightweight. I was able to get it setup by myself in about 1 minute. 😀
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A restful sound
customer_reviews.text: The soothing sound of a fountain is a nice addition to our back yard, and can be heard inside the house by an open window. It was easy to mount on the stucco wall (I had the correct drill and hook already), and I run it using a timer. It's a nice addition to our home, and we look forward to birds to be attracted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for deck/patio. Adjustable flow, heavy enough to not blow down, nice finish (blue/gray), easy assembly. Good quality for the $.
customer_reviews.author: ManfredWD

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was skeptical on the beginning but I soon arrives I got in love with my lovely fountain is make me happy that I was the best product I buy , I read reviews good and bad about this product but so far I really pleased and happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: moises acosta

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Oh this fountain is the best addition to the side yard! I read reviews about a lot of splashing, but once we stuck a long conch shell ceramic inside the water it has really reduced the splashing and also quieted the fountain a bit. This was the easiest to assemble and hang. Super light and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound of the water you can actually hear it. Some are too soft. Only issue was that the tubing to connect to the pump was way too tight & couldn't get on without putting a little dish soap around it. That caused bubbles so was afraid it would harm the pump. But got bubble cleaned out & all is fine. Was easy to assemble other than the tubing. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Love my fountain! Has minor flaws in appearance, but overall a good fountain. So far, no problems with functional, keeping fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my fountain! The sound is exactly what I was hoping for, I can hear it instead and outside of my home. The resin material is sturdy, the pump started right up, it came very well packaged, no issues. Three easy installation steps and you’re good to go. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It is lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Put it next to my flowers & patio furniture out back on my deck next to my lantern on the siding of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rich
